customAccent.title: Default Accent Color
customAccent.description: Keeps theme's default accent color. Uncheck to allow the chosen accent color to take affect.

customBadgeBorder.title: Default Badge Border Color
customBadgeBorder.description: Use the default badge border color of transparent. Uncheck to allow the chosen badge border color to take affect.

customBorder.title: Default Main Border Color
customBorder.description: Use the default border color in main worspace components. Uncheck to allow the chosen main border color to take affect.

borderColor.title: Custom Main Border Color
borderColor.description: Choose custom border color in main workspace components.

customCaret.title: Default Caret Color
customCaret.description: Use the default blinking text cursor color of orange. Uncheck to allow the chosen caret color to take affect.

caretColor.title: Custom Caret Color
caretColor.description: Choose custom blinking text cursor color.

directoryIndicator.title: Directory Indicator
directoryIndicator.description: Lighten the background of open dictories.

matchSyntaxTheme.title: Match Syntax Theme
matchSyntaxTheme.description: Override syntax theme's background color to match Valence-UI theme.

extColor.title: File Type Color
extColor.description: Disable file type colors for less distracting file and folder navigation.

fontSize.title: Change Font-size
fontSize.description: adjust font-size for all UI components. For editor font-size adjustments go to Editor Settings.

settingsPanel.title: Settings Panel color
settingsPanel.description: Use the default setting's panel background color of dark blue. Uncheck to use colorful gradient.

animationEnabled.title: Enable Animations
animationEnabled.description: Toggle theme animations if you find them distracting or need the extra CPU. Uncheck to disable the animations.

stickyEnabled.title: Sticky Folder Tab
stickyEnabled.description: Enable transparent sticky project folder tab.
